entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 41 %

Dewpoint: -38.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 24.
